title: Inclusive Project Design Based on COIL for Science Education for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Experience with Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Ensuring participation of students with disabilities and enhancing technology-based accessibility in international collaborative learning settings.

learning_goals: Collaborative Online International Learning (COIL) can be utilized to form mixed teams of students with and without disabilities to complete science projects
Technology-based platforms (cloud collaboration tools, accessibility software, etc.) can be used to design inclusive learning environments
Project-based assessment criteria can be applied to fairly measure the learning outcomes of students with disabilities

resources: Assistive Technology Devices (Supported by Student Life Support Center)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
